entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy. Showers beginning before morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries or rain showers beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
